item.title: C0re Practices: How to Actually Fucking Do This
item.description: PRACTICAL VIBEC0RE: From Theory to FUCKING ACTION ðŸš€ðŸ’œ You’ve read the philosophy. Now let’s fucking IMPLEMENT IT. The Daily Vibe Routine Morning Activation Protocol Traditional Dev Morning: Check emails (30 min) Stand-up meeting (15 min) Review yesterday’s code (20 min) Plan today’s tasks (15 min) Finally start coding (10am) VIBEC0RE Morning: 1# 9:00 AM 2$ git pull && cargo run 3$ echo "fuck it let's go" > today.vibe 4$ hx .
